alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Guernsey; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 10:09PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN GUERNSEY...WEST CENTRAL BELMONT AND NORTHEASTERN NOBLE COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM EDT... At 1009 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Cambridge, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Antrim, Quaker City, Senecaville, Lore City, Old Washington, Salesville, Fairview, Seneca Lake Park, and Salt Fork State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 181 and 201. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 46 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
